welcome_message_body: Welcome to Montville, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password to access.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
